entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 80 km/h gusting to 110. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 90 km/h gusting to 120 becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
